basic.floral_language:
Malva sinensis
Floriography: tenacious, sunny, graceful
Malva sinensis have erect stems. Flowers are of different colors, large size, single petal or polyphyll. Long flowering time. Round green leaves with incised margin. Widely used for landscaping with a huge popularity. 
Even though Malva sinensis love abundance of sunshine, need shading during summer time. Flowering from June to October, lasting for 2-3 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period June-October, viewing period 2-3 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like adequate light, shade properly under summer strong light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in summer to avoid root rots
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased, dead leaves and withered flowers timely
